bill.title: HSAC Package; Penal Code; Firefighters; Water Safety Officers
bill.description: Adds the assault of firefighters and water safety officers to the offense of assault in the second degree. Creates a class B felony for unauthorized entry in a dwelling based on occupant's age and incapacity. (CD1)
